I just wanted to add that the deer are a pair doe and stag. The doe 
is rec=
umbant signifying calm and the stag is wary and on guard. This 
may signify=
 the times the tsuba was made. I wonder if we can ignore 
the fact that in =
Asia the deer was to have mystical properties? John
